name: Block Car Race
description:
Race along the track in the fun blocky style racing game. Go as fast as you can and avoid the other cars for as long as you can. Play against your family and friends, and see who can go the longest in the Block Car Race!

Features:
- Loads of cars to unlock
- Fun Block Style Gaming
- Share your score with friends and family
- Lots more to see inside the game! Play for free!
